version_description:
We apologize to our users with older devices. Apple's compiler no longer allows us to compile for iPhone3G and earlier. Do not accept this update unless you are using iOS 4.3 or later!

o Adds several new blocks and creatures for use in the Kitty Connect editor
o Adds support for the BladePad gaming device
o Fixes a few iOS5 glitches
o Fixes a teleporter bug
o Fixes a bug when the robot falls too far
o Adds iAds. We have tried to make the ads as unobtrusive as possible-- they will not appear during gameplay. If you have purchased any upgrades, ads will disappear. If you haven't purchased anything, please touch an ad to help us continue to develop games!

o Fixes a bug when the robot falls too far
o Adds iAds. We have tried to make the ads as unobtrusive as possible-- they will not appear during gameplay. If you have purchased any upgrades, ads will disappear. If you haven't purchased anything, please touch an ad to help us continue to develop games!

We apologize to our users with older devices. Apple's compiler no longer allows us to compile for iPhone3G and earlier. Do not accept this update unless you are using iOS 4.3 or later!

o Adds several new blocks and creatures for use in the Kitty Connect editor
o Adds support for the BladePad gaming device
o Fixes a few iOS5 glitches
o Fixes a teleporter bug
o Fixes a bug when the robot falls too far
o Adds iAds. We have tried to make the ads as unobtrusive as possible-- they will not appear during gameplay. If you have purchased any upgrades, ads will disappear. If you haven't purchased anything, please touch an ad to help us continue to develop games!

We apologize to our users with older devices. Apple's compiler no longer allows us to compile for iPhone3G and earlier. Do not accept this update unless you are using iOS 4.3 or later!

o Adds several new blocks and creatures for use in the Kitty Connect editor
o Adds support for the BladePad gaming device
o Fixes a few iOS5 glitches
o Fixes a teleporter bug
o Fixes a bug when the robot falls too far
o Adds iAds. We have tried to make the ads as unobtrusive as possible-- they will not appear during gameplay. If you have purchased any upgrades, ads will disappear. If you haven't purchased anything, please touch an ad to help us continue to develop games!

o Better stability
o Fixed a bug in level searching
o Added a new tab for last twenty-five recently played levels
o Creator's level number is now visible in Makermall
o Teleporters now teleport slightly faster
o A few map glitches repaired
o Drips, Bosses, and other randomized behaviors will now have a consistent pattern for each level
o New Blocks for creators: Secret Wall Block, Spike blocks, Radio Towers
o New Enemy for creators: Phages
o New powerup and new enemy options (visit www.raptisoft.com/rwk for full details)

NOTE TO USERS: New editor features will not be enabled until the server is upgraded. This will be done as soon as the game is approved and available on all mobile platforms.

o New Blocks for creators: Secret Wall Block, Spike blocks, Radio Towers
